1.rationale:

 – LEFT: (5,0) → appears free.
 – RIGHT: (7,0) → is also free.

To decide our move, let’s consider which apple to target next. We can quickly calculate the Manhattan distances from our head:

• To (7,5): |7–6| + |5–0| = 1 + 5 = 6
• To (1,4): |1–6| + |4–0| = 5 + 4 = 9
• To (0,6): |0–6| + |6–0| = 6 + 6 = 12
• To (5,2): |5–6| + |2–0| = 1 + 2 = 3
• To (6,8): |6–6| + |8–0| = 0 + 8 = 8

The apple at (5,2) is clearly the nearest.

A good path toward (5,2) is to head left from (6,0) to (5,0) and then move upward on subsequent turns. Checking (5,0), it is free and does not pose any immediate danger from walls, our body, or enemy snakes.

Thus, our best move at this moment is to go LEFT.
